div.div: St. Thomas vs. St. Olaf College

tr.td: UST wins toss, elects to receive
Ezra Coughlin kickoff 54 yards to the UST-MEN11, Nick Waldvogel return 19 yards to the UST-MEN30 (Riley Hedstrom).
Jack Kaiser rush for 4 yards to the UST-MEN34 (Coleman Foley).
